se.softhouse.common.strings

Class Describables

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.softhouse.common.strings.Describables

  • public final class Describables
extends Object
    Gives you static access to implementations of the Describable interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Describables.SerializableDescription
      A Serializable wrapper for Describables

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Describables.SerializableDescription EMPTY_STRING
      Returns an empty string as a describable.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Describables.SerializableDescription asSerializable(Describable describable)
      Returns a version of describable that is serializable.
      static Describable cache(Describable describable)
      Lazily caches the result of running Describable.description() on describable so that it's only run once.
      static Describable format(String formatTemplate, Object... args)
      Lazily calls String.format(String, Object...)
      static IllegalArgumentException illegalArgument(Describable message)
      Creates an IllegalArgumentException where the Describable.description() of message is used as the detail message.
      static IllegalArgumentException illegalArgument(Describable message, Throwable cause)
      Creates an IllegalArgumentException where the Describable.description() of message is used as the detail message.
      static Describable toString(Object value)
      Lazily calls the Object.toString() of value as a describable
      static Describable withString(String description)
      Supplies an already created String as a Describable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_STRING

        @Nonnull
public static final Describables.SerializableDescription EMPTY_STRING
        Returns an empty string as a describable.

    • Method Detail

      • withString

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static Describable withString(String description)
        Supplies an already created String as a Describable. Also useful for caching Describables that won't change.

      • format

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static Describable format(String formatTemplate,
                                          Object... args)
        Lazily calls String.format(String, Object...)

      • cache

        public static Describable cache(Describable describable)
        Lazily caches the result of running Describable.description() on describable so that it's only run once.

      • toString

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static Describable toString(Object value)
        Lazily calls the Object.toString() of value as a describable
        Parameters:
        value - the object to call Object.toString() on

      • illegalArgument

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static IllegalArgumentException illegalArgument(Describable message)
        Creates an IllegalArgumentException where the Describable.description() of message is used as the detail message.

      • illegalArgument

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static IllegalArgumentException illegalArgument(Describable message,
                                                                Throwable cause)
        Creates an IllegalArgumentException where the Describable.description() of message is used as the detail message. cause is set as the cause.

      • asSerializable

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static Describables.SerializableDescription asSerializable(Describable describable)
        Returns a version of describable that is serializable. Note that after serialization the describable is fixed, that is Describable.description() won't be called on describable any more.
